messages.body: Hi, I'm having trouble accessing my account dashboard. When I click on the settings page, it just shows a blank screen. Is there any maintenance going on?

Hi John,

Thanks for reaching out about this issue. Our team is aware of some intermittent access problems with the dashboard and we're working on a fix. This should be resolved within the next hour.

In the meantime, you can try clearing your browser cache or using an incognito window as a temporary workaround.

Please let me know if you need any other assistance!

Best regards,
Sarah
Helper Support
